title: Retire an Old Public Asset
description: A public fountain is being decommissioned. An operator must update the city's asset records.

tasks.description: Receive a work order confirming the decommissioning of the 'Central Plaza Fountain'.
Locate the fountain in the asset management database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct asset record.

tasks.description: Change the asset's status to 'Decommissioned' and archive its record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the asset database to reflect the change.
